ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Update?
ygData.msgSnippet: At 01:50 PM 5/20/99 -0700, you wrote: I read the descriptions at EQVault and back before they changed the spell descriptions. Don t be a Verant apologizt they
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:50 PM 5/20/99 -0700, you wrote:

I read the descriptions at EQVault and back before they changed the spell
descriptions. Don't be a Verant apologizt they and everyone else knew the
stuns were broken and then isntead of fixing them they turned the breakage
into a feature. And stunning for 2 seconds would ahve disrupted their casts
as well. The only difference is that the new and improved stun is ONLY
useful on certain spell casting mobs.


>From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
>
>> Direct damage spells that ahve "stuns" that don't
>> work, yet cause us to ahve
>> total resists instead of partial ones and a higher
>> overall resist rate.
>>
>
>
>Where in the game does it say these spells are supposed to stun? You
>may have read this description on someone's web page, but I doubt
>anyone at Verant said that it would stun. I seem to recall them saying
>that the spells would shock rather than stun. The shock effect causes
>a spellcaster to be interrupted. Try it on a spell casting mob. I've
>gotten it to work on Orc oracles. Hit one of the chaos flux types as
>soon as you see their grubby little hands glow and you can fizzle their spell.
>_____________________________________________________________

>
>
--
Silverlock, ICQ 474725
